text: A selfie is a photo taken of yourself, by yourself. It's a self-portrait that usually winds up getting shared on social media sites like Instagram, Facebook, Twitter, and so forth. While just about everyone and their dog is guilty of snapping a selfie from time to time, celebrities have truly mastered the art of taking the most outrageous, funny, and bizarre selfies on the web. Check out a few of our favorites, below.
title: 25 of Our Favorite Celebrities Taking Funny Selfies

meta_data.description: As if we didn't already want Beyonce to be our BFF...! Take a look at some of our favorite Hollywood stars taking their silliest, funniest selfies.
meta_data.sailthru.author: Beverly Jenkins
